text: @realDonaldTrump The market is tanking because you called Covid-19 a "Democrat Hoax," making it clear that you're utterly incapable of dealing with reality, care about nothing than advancing your reelection by demonizing your perceived enemies, and that your understanding of disease is ZERO.
